dict.string: dTweet needs camera access to let you capture photos and videos for your tweets and replies. You can create rich media content to share with your followers.
dTweet needs microphone access to record audio when you create video tweets and replies. This allows you to add voice narration to your video content.
dTweet needs photo library access to save your captured photos and videos, and to let you select existing media for your tweets and replies.
dTweet uses notifications to keep you updated about new chat messages, mentions, and important updates from your network.
